channel.title: Pages on Code Kitty
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Code Kitty

item.title: Code
item.description: Web USB Bluetooth   Code in Python 2 right in your browser! Click in the white space below and start typing! function resizeIframe(obj) { obj.style.height = 1.05*obj.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + 'px'; } For even more fun learning Python Turtle, check out The Art of Code!   Hook up your USB cable, then click connect Choose the connection with ACM in the name Bluetooth coming soon!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Whether you'd like to schedule a workshop, volunteer, partner, donate, or contact us for any other reason, we’d love to hear from you! Drop us a line below Name Email Your message Submit

item.title: Donate
item.description: Please consider making a tax-exempt donation to our non-profit helping further our mission and fund our efforts. You can also add Code Kitty as your Charity! Just go to https://smile.amazon.com and choose to support Code Kitty (in Plymouth, MN)!

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: Code Kitty has been made possible by the following sponsors: ECMC Foundation Startup Weekend Twin Cities Propel Nonprofits 3M Visting Wizards Amelar Family Foundation Cycling Ladies In Tech The Works Museum The Bakken Museum Wayzata Public Schools Girl Scouts MN Minneapolis Public Schools City of Lakes Americorps Adafruit Industries Google Amazon Digi-key Utepils Brewing Code.org GiveMN and tons of awesome people like you!

item.title: Workshops
item.description: Our workshops have helped over 200 students succeed at coding, robotics, and engineering. All of our donations go back into providing our robot kits and instructional materials as cheaply as possible, and we rely on grants to cover our operational costs. Suggested Donations We’ve worked really hard to keep our costs down, and are proud to offer our 3 hour in person workshop, which includes the robot kit, for a low suggested donation per student.
